learning.supervised.methods.knn

Class KNN

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.Classifier
      • learning.supervised.methods.knn.KNN
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, java.io.Serializable, ValidateableInterface, AutomaticKFinderInterface, DistToPointsQueryUserInterface, NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface

    public class KNN
extends Classifier
implements AutomaticKFinderInterface, DistToPointsQueryUserInterface, NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface, java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the basic k-nearest neighbor classifier.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • classifyWithKDistAndNeighbors

        public int classifyWithKDistAndNeighbors(DataInstance instance,
                                float[] kDistances,
                                int[] trNeighbors)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Classify the point of interest based on the kNN set and the distances to the neighbor points.
        Parameters:
        instance - DataInstance object that is to be classified.
        kDistances - float[] representing the distances to the k-nearest neighbors.
        trNeighbors - int[] representing the indexes of the kNN set.
        Returns:
        Integer that is the predicted class affiliation in the point of interest.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        This method performs classification of the target data point, based on its nearest neighbors and the distances to all the training points, given for reference.

        classify in interface NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface
        Parameters:
        instance - DataInstance object that is to be classified.
        distToTraining - float[] representing distances to all training points.
        trNeighbors - int[] representing the indexes of the k-nearest neighbors among the training data.
        Returns:
        Integer that is the classification outcome, the prediction of the class label.

        public float[] classifyProbabilistically(DataInstance instance,

        Description copied from interface: NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface

        classifyProbabilistically in interface NeighborPointsQueryUserInterface
        Parameters:
